Topic.Title: Newbie : How do I add a screen shot to a forum post

Posts.EditableText:
My first post on here and I want to add a screen shot of my game to a post so I can ask for help - easier than trying to describe the issue.  How ?   The forum help guide only tells you how to format text

tks
Dave
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
Once you uploaded the image somewhere (imgur is good), you can put a link in your post. If you want to include your image directly, you can use HTML. Something like: 
<img src="https://address.of/your/picture.png" />
